p: Figure 2 shows the self‐reported use of HIV services in 2011 and 2017 for those testing HIV+. For both 2011 and 2017, better outcomes were seen for each outcome among NGO clients ( p < 0.001). A higher proportion of NGO clients reported being aware of their HIV+ status, more were registered at an AIDS centre, and more self‐reported being on ART. The disparities between the outcomes for the NGO and non‐NGO clients increased from 2011 to 2017.
